### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper plate factory
No copper plate factory exists

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities to be connected are valid and that there are no obstacles in the way.
- Make sure that the pipe type is correct for the fluid being transported.
- Verify that the entities are compatible with the pipe type being used.
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure that the entity has enough space to hold the item being inserted.
- Verify that the item being inserted is compatible with the entity.
### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Make sure that the entity has the item being extracted.
- Verify that the entity is accessible and that there are no obstacles in the way.
